mapper.select: select sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 5 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS first, sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 4 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS second, sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 3 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS third, sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 2 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS fourth, sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS fifth, sum(case when DATE_FORMAT(usertime,'%Y-%m')=DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{date}, INTERVAL 0 MONTH),'%Y-%m') then 1 else 0 end) AS six from tbluser
